self.curveFitter.addXyzHpr(t, pos, hpr)
                # And the point set
                self.pointSet.append([t, pos, hpr])
        # Add last point
        pos = Vec3(0)
        hpr = Vec3(0)
        self.curveCollection.evaluate(self.cropTo, pos, hpr)
        self.curveFitter.addXyzHpr(self.cropTo - self.cropFrom, pos, hpr)
        # Compute curve
        self.computeCurves()
